13 def save_marker_array_to_file(marker_array, filename):
14  assert type(marker_array) == MarkerArray
15  with open(filename, 'w') as f:
16  f.write('#VRML V2.0 utf8\n#\n')
17  f.write('# created from OctoMap \n')
18  for marker in marker_array.markers:
19  if len(marker.points) > 0:
20  for i in range(len(marker.points)):
21  print 'Transform { translation %f %f %f \n ' % (marker.points[i].x, marker.points[i].y, marker.points[i].z)
22  f.write('Transform { translation %f %f %f \n ' % (marker.points[i].x, marker.points[i].y, marker.points[i].z))
23  f.write('children [ Shape { appearance Appearance { material Material { diffuseColor %f %f %f } } ' %
24  (marker.colors[i].r, marker.colors[i].g, marker.colors[i].b) +
25  'geometry Box { size %f %f %f } } ]\n}\n' % (marker.scale.x, marker.scale.y, marker.scale.z))
26 
27 
28 openravepy.RaveSetDebugLevel(openravepy.DebugLevel.Error)
29 if __name__ == "__main__":
30 
31  file_name = 'crinspect_octomap'
32  topic_name = '/camera/depth/points'
33 
34  rospy.init_node('test_octomap', anonymous=False)
35  env = openravepy.Environment()
36  # env.Load('robots/denso_with_ftsensor.robot.xml')
37  env.Load('worlds/lab_demo.env.xml')
38  robot = env.GetRobot('robot')
39  robot.SetActiveDOFValues([0, -0.34906585, 2.26892803, 0, 1.22173048, 0])
40  # env.SetDefaultViewer()
41  env.SetViewer('qtcoin')
42 
43  # Initialize octomap
44  openravepy.RaveLoadPlugin("or_octomap")
45  sensor_server = openravepy.RaveCreateSensorSystem(env, "or_octomap")
46  sensor_server.SendCommand("Enable")
47  # print 'collision_checker', env.GetCollisionChecker(), 'kinbodies', env.GetBodies()
48  # rospy.set_param('/or_octomap/resolution', 0.05)
49  # sensor_server.SendCommand("Reset")
50  sensor_server.SendCommand("ResetTopic " + topic_name)
51 
52  rospy.loginfo('Wait for octomap created...')
53  try:
54  marker_array = MarkerArray()
55  time_start = time.time()
56  marker_array = rospy.wait_for_message('/occupied_cells_vis_array', MarkerArray, timeout=200)
57  t = time.time() - time_start
58  rospy.logwarn('Time for constructing the octomap: {}'.format(t))
59  sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
60  time.sleep(0.5)
61  sensor_server.SendCommand("Mask " + robot.GetName())
62  sensor_server.SendCommand("Mask " + 'denso_base')
63  sensor_server.SendCommand("Mask " + "workspace")
64  sensor_server.SendCommand("Save " + file_name)
65  # save_marker_array_to_file(marker_array, file_name + '.wrl')
66  # sensor_server.SendCommand("Reset")
67 
68  except KeyboardInterrupt, rospy.exceptions.ROSException:
69  rospy.logerr('The octomap is not created.')
70  # exit()
71 
72  env.Load(file_name + '.wrl')
73  octomap = env.GetKinBody(file_name)
74 
75  criros.raveutils.enable_body(octomap, False)
76 
77  # time_start = time.time()
78  env.CheckCollision(robot)
79  # t = time.time()-time_start
80  # print 'single collision_test time: {}'.format(t)
81  # print env.CheckCollision(robot)
82 
83  lower, upper = robot.GetActiveDOFLimits()
84  stop = True
85  while not stop:
86  if rospy.is_shutdown():
87  stop = True
88  try:
89  qgoal = lower+np.random.rand(len(lower))*(upper-lower)
90  print "qgoal: ", qgoal
91  # qcur = robot.GetActiveDOFValues()
92  # robot.SetActiveDOFValues(qgoal)
93  # print 'qcur', qcur
94  # time.sleep(0.5)
95  # robot.SetActiveDOFValues(qcur)
96 
97  traj = planning.plan_to_joint_configuration(robot, qgoal, planner='birrt', max_iters=200, max_ppiters=100)
98  print "planning finish."
99  if traj is None:
100  robot.SetActiveDOFValues([0, -0.34906585, 2.26892803, 0, 1.22173048, 0])
101  else:
102  controller = robot.GetController()
103  controller.SetPath(traj)
104  robot.WaitForController(0)
105  print 'trajectory execution finish'
106  except KeyboardInterrupt:
107  print 'Error encountered.'
108  exit()
109 
110  # IPython.embed()
111  exit()
